original_text: We have acted very corruptly against you and have not kept the commandments, the statutes, and the rules that you commanded your servant Moses.
korean_text: 주를 향하여 크게 악을 행하여 주께서 주의 종 모세에게 명령하신 계명과 율례와 규례를 지키지 아니하였나이다

sentences.original_text: We have acted very corruptly against you
and have not kept the commandments, the statutes, and the rules
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 계명과 율례와 규례를 지키지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: that you commanded your servant Moses.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 주님께서 종 모세에게 명령하신 것들입니다
